ComicInfo.Title: Cats and Dolls [Episode 11]; Cat-astrophe! [Episode 10]; Shoo! [Episode 9]
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-15 14:39:32. [CVDB121208] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 00:17:33. [Issue ID 262828]
ComicInfo.Characters: Stealer,the Werewolf (cameo),Inspector Battleball Bullet,Cat Claw [Carol Conor]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Cats and Dolls [Episode 11]: Cat Claw fights the Stealer and his gang.
Cat-astrophe! [Episode 10]: Inspector Bullet and the police arrive in the middle of Cat Claw's argument with Phil Fireball and try to arrest her. Later, Cat Claw is shopping for a new costume when a gang of thieves break into the store.
Shoo! [Episode 9]: Dr. Morse is caring for the monster Grgur, now shrunk to baby-size. Meanwhile, Cat Claw confronts reporter Phil Fireball.
